 0 = ULC (upper left origin, column major)
 1 = URC (upper right origin, column major)
 2 = LLC (lower left origin, column major)
 3 = LRC (lower right origin, column major)
 4 = ULR (upper left origin, row major)
 5 = URR (upper right origin, row major)
 6 = LLR (lower left origin, row major)
 7 = LRR (lower right origin, row major)

Also, all the ../intergraph samples also apply to Z/I Imaging.
